TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable beforefieldinit ParameterInfo extends System.Object implements class System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider, class System.Runtime.InteropServices._ParameterInfo, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IObjectReference
Public Class ParameterInfo Implements _ParameterInfo, ICustomAttributeProvider, IObjectReference
type ParameterInfo = class interface ICustomAttributeProvider interface _ParameterInfo interface IObjectReference

summary.span: 发现参数的属性并提供对参数元数据的访问权限。

span.span: Discovers the attributes of a parameter and provides access to parameter metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的实例`ParameterInfo`若要获取有关参数的数据类型的信息，默认值，依次类推。Use an instance of `ParameterInfo` to obtain information about the parameter's data type, default value, and so on. 返回一个数组`ParameterInfo`对象表示的方法，按顺序的参数。 returns an array of `ParameterInfo` objects representing the parameters of a method, in order. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用各种反射类来分析包含在程序集中的元数据。This example shows how to use various reflection classes to analyze the metadata contained in an assembly. [!code-cpp[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/CPP/reflection.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/CS/Reflection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/VB/Reflection.vb#1)]

span.span: This type is thread safe.

summary.span: 获取此参数的属性。

span.span: Gets the attributes for this parameter.

value.span: 表示该参数的特性的 对象。

span.span: A object representing the attributes for this parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法利用方法。This method utilizes the method. 若要获取数组，请先获取该方法或构造函数，然后调用。To get the array, first get the method or the constructor and then call . ## Examples 下面的示例定义具有三个参数的方法。The following example defines a method with three parameters. 它使用属性来获取第二个参数的属性并将其显示在控制台上。It uses the property to get the attributes of the second parameter and display them at the console. [!code-cpp[ParameterInfo_Attributes1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_Attributes1/CPP/parameterinfo_attributes1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ParameterInfo_Attributes1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_Attributes1/CS/parameterinfo_attributes1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ParameterInfo_Attributes1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_Attributes1/VB/parameterinfo_attributes1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 参数的属性。

span.span: The attributes of the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段仅用于派生类中的用户`ParameterInfo`。This field is intended only for users who are deriving classes from `ParameterInfo`. 对参数属性的典型访问是通过。Typical access to parameter attributes is through .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段仅用于派生类中的用户`ParameterInfo`。This field is intended only for users who are deriving classes from `ParameterInfo`. 对参数类型的典型访问是通过。Typical access to parameter types is through .

summary.span: 获取一个指示默认值的值（如果参数具有默认值）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the default value if the parameter has a default value.

value.span: 参数的默认值，或 （如果参数没有默认值）。

span.span: The default value of the parameter, or if the parameter has no default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在执行上下文中使用此属性。This property is used only in the execution context. 在仅限反射上下文中，使用属性改为。In the reflection-only context, use the property instead. 在方法调用中未指定实际值时，使用默认值。The default value is used when an actual value is not specified in the method call. 参数可以具有默认值是`null`。A parameter can have a default value that is `null`. 这是不同于其中未定义默认值的情况。This is distinct from the case where a default value is not defined. 此方法利用方法。This method utilizes the method. 若要获取数组，请先获取该方法或构造函数，然后调用。To get the array, first get the method or the constructor and then call .

summary.span: 参数的默认值。

span.span: The default value of the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段仅用于派生类中的用户`ParameterInfo`。This field is intended only for users who are deriving classes from `ParameterInfo`. 典型访问参数的默认值是通过。Typical access to the default value of the parameter is through .

summary.span: 获取应用于此参数的自定义属性。

span.span: Gets the custom attributes applied to this parameter.

param.name: inherit
param.span: 对于该类型的对象，将忽略此自变量。

span.span: This argument is ignored for objects of this type.

summary.span: 获取此参数上定义的所有自定义属性。

span.span: Gets all the custom attributes defined on this parameter.

returns.span: 包含应用于此参数的所有自定义属性的数组。

span.span: An array that contains all the custom attributes applied to this parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会忽略`inherit`参数。This method ignores the `inherit` parameter. 若要搜索的参数属性的继承链，使用的适当重载方法。To search the inheritance chain for attributes on parameters, use the appropriate overloads of the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何自定义特性已应用到的方法的参数可以在运行时检索。The following example shows how custom attributes that have been applied to the parameters of methods can be retrieved at run time. 该示例定义名为的自定义属性`MyAttribute`，可以应用于参数。The example defines a custom attribute named `MyAttribute` that can be applied to parameters. 该示例然后定义一个名为类`MyClass`与名为方法`MyMethod`，并应用`MyAttribute`对参数的方法。The example then defines a class named `MyClass` with a method named `MyMethod`, and applies `MyAttribute` to a parameter of the method. 运行示例时，它使用方法来检索已应用于中的所有方法的所有参数的自定义特性`MyClass`，并在控制台上显示它们。When the example is run, it uses the method to retrieve the custom attributes that have been applied to all parameters of all methods in `MyClass`, and displays them at the console. [!code-cpp[ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttributes/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttributes/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttributes/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 无法加载自定义属性类型。

span.span: A custom attribute type could not be loaded.

summary.span: 返回当前参数的 对象列表，这些对象可以在仅反射上下文中使用。

span.span: Returns a list of objects for the current parameter, which can be used in the reflection-only context.

returns.span: 对象的泛型列表，表示有关已应用于当前参数的特性的数据。

span.span: A generic list of objects representing data about the attributes that have been applied to the current parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于检查代码中的仅限反射的上下文，在其中加载到仅反射上下文的代码中定义的自定义特性本身的情况下的自定义特性。Use this method to examine the custom attributes of code in the reflection-only context, in cases where the custom attributes themselves are defined in code that is loaded into the reflection-only context. 等方法和能在这种情况下，因为它们创建特性的实例。Methods such as and cannot be used in such cases, because they create instances of the attributes. 不能执行仅限反射上下文中的代码。Code in the reflection-only context cannot be executed. 有关详细信息和示例代码，请参阅类。For more information and example code, see the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法提供托管的编译器的设计器。The and methods are provided for designers of managed compilers. 自定义修饰符的详细信息，请参阅中的相关类和命名空间，并在 ECMA 第 II 文档中的元数据规范。For more information on custom modifiers, see and related classes in the namespace, and the metadata specification in the ECMA Partition II documentation. 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会忽略`inherit`参数。This method ignores the `inherit` parameter. 若要搜索的参数属性的继承链，使用的适当重载方法。To search the inheritance chain for attributes on parameters, use the appropriate overloads of the method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义两个自定义特性`MyAttribute`和`MyDerivedAttribute`。The following example defines two custom attributes, `MyAttribute` and `MyDerivedAttribute`. `MyDerivedAttribute` 派生自 `MyAttribute`。`MyDerivedAttribute` is derived from `MyAttribute`. 然后，该示例将这些属性应用到的示例类的方法参数。The example then applies these attributes to the parameters of a method of an example class. 运行示例时，它使用方法来测试示例类中的所有方法的所有参数。When the example is run, it uses the method to test all parameters of all methods in the example class. 然后，它显示的参数具有`MyAttribute`或`MyDerivedAttribute`。It then displays the parameters that have `MyAttribute` or `MyDerivedAttribute`. [!code-cpp[ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined/CPP/ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined/CS/parameterinfo_getcustomattribute_isdefined.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined/VB/parameterinfo_getcustomattribute_isdefined.vb#1)]

span.span: if the parameter is an input parameter; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法依赖于可选元数据的标志。This method depends on an optional metadata flag. 可以通过编译器，插入此标志，但编译器并非必须这样做。This flag can be inserted by compilers, but the compilers are not obligated to do so. 此方法利用`In`标志的`ParameterAttributes`枚举器。This method utilizes the `In` flag of the `ParameterAttributes` enumerator. 若要获取数组，请先获取该方法或构造函数，然后调用。To get the array, first get the method or the constructor and then call . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何测试方法的参数， ，和属性。The following example shows how to test method parameters for the , , and attributes. 此示例包含`DefineMethod`方法执行以下操作：The example contains a `DefineMethod` method that does the following: - 创建动态程序集包含`MyType`类型。Creates a dynamic assembly containing a `MyType` type. - 将添加`MyMethod`方法`MyType`。Adds a `MyMethod` method to `MyType`. `MyMethod` 有三个参数。`MyMethod` has three parameters. 使用定义的第一个参数，使用第二，并与第三个。The first parameter is defined with , the second with , and the third with . - 调用以完成该类型。Calls to complete the type. 执行后`DefineMethod`，该示例搜索直至找到动态程序集当前加载的程序集。After executing `DefineMethod`, the example searches the assemblies that are currently loaded until it finds the dynamic assembly. 它将加载`MyType`从该程序集，获取对象`MyMethod`方法，并检查参数。It loads `MyType` from the assembly, gets a object for the `MyMethod` method, and examines the parameters. 该示例使用， ，和要显示的参数信息的属性。The example uses the , , and properties to display information about the parameters. [!code-cpp[ParameterInfo_IsIn_IsOut_IsOptional#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_IsIn_IsOut_IsOptional/CPP/ParameterInfo_IsIn_IsOut_IsOptional.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ParameterInfo_IsIn_IsOut_IsOptional#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_IsIn_IsOut_IsOptional/CS/parameterinfo_isin_isout_isoptional.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ParameterInfo_IsIn_IsOut_IsOptional#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_IsIn_IsOut_IsOptional/VB/parameterinfo_isin_isout_isoptional.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法依赖于可选元数据的标志。This method depends on an optional metadata flag. 可以通过编译器，插入此标志，但编译器并非必须这样做。This flag can be inserted by compilers, but the compilers are not obligated to do so. 此方法利用`Out`标志的`ParameterAttributes`枚举器。This method utilizes the `Out` flag of the `ParameterAttributes` enumerator. 若要获取数组，请先获取该方法或构造函数，然后调用。To get the array, first get the method or the constructor and then call . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何测试方法的参数， ，和属性。The following example shows how to test method parameters for the , , and attributes. 此示例包含`DefineMethod`方法执行以下操作：The example contains a `DefineMethod` method that does the following: - 创建动态程序集包含`MyType`类型。Creates a dynamic assembly containing a `MyType` type. - 将添加`MyMethod`方法`MyType`。Adds a `MyMethod` method to `MyType`. `MyMethod` 有三个参数。`MyMethod` has three parameters. 使用定义的第一个参数，使用第二，并与第三个。The first parameter is defined with , the second with , and the third with . - 调用以完成该类型。Calls to complete the type. 执行后`DefineMethod`，该示例搜索直至找到动态程序集当前加载的程序集。After executing `DefineMethod`, the example searches the assemblies that are currently loaded until it finds the dynamic assembly. 它将加载`MyType`从该程序集，获取对象`MyMethod`方法，并检查参数。It loads `MyType` from the assembly, gets a object for the `MyMethod` method, and examines the parameters. 该示例使用， ，和要显示的参数信息的属性。The example uses the , , and properties to display information about the parameters. [!code-cpp[Classic ParameterInfo.IsOut Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ParameterInfo.IsOut Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ParameterInfo.IsOut Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ParameterInfo.IsOut Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ParameterInfo.IsOut Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ParameterInfo.IsOut Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法依赖于可选元数据的标志。This method depends on an optional metadata flag. 可以通过编译器，插入此标志，但编译器并非必须这样做。This flag can be inserted by compilers, but the compilers are not obligated to do so. 此方法利用`Retval`标志的`ParameterAttributes`枚举器。This method utilizes the `Retval` flag of the `ParameterAttributes` enumerator. 若要获取数组，请先获取该方法或构造函数，然后调用。To get the array, first get the method or the constructor and then call .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段仅用于派生类中的用户`ParameterInfo`。This field is intended only for users who are deriving classes from `ParameterInfo`. 对参数名称的典型访问是通过。Typical access to the parameter name is through the .

span.span: Gets a value that identifies this parameter in metadata.

value.span: 与模块一起使用的值，可在元数据中唯一标识此参数。

span.span: A value which, in combination with the module, uniquely identifies this parameter in metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取该模块，请使用定义此参数的成员属性。To get the module, use the property of the member that defines this parameter. 使用此属性获取的令牌可以传递到非托管反射 API。The tokens obtained using this property can be passed to the unmanaged Reflection API. 有关详细信息，请参阅[非托管反射 API](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c5bb9de-0cf6-438d-ba47-134e6c775fb8)。For more information, please see [Unmanaged Reflection API](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c5bb9de-0cf6-438d-ba47-134e6c775fb8).

public: virtual property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取参数的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the parameter.
The simple name of this parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使用受保护字段，并依赖于可能不能在所有的编译器中可选的元数据标记。This property utilizes the protected field, and depends on an optional metadata flag that might not be available in all compilers. 若要获取数组，请先获取该方法或构造函数，然后调用方法。To get the array, first get the method or the constructor and then call the method. > [!WARNING] > 如果此表示返回值 (即，如果它通过使用获得属性)，此属性将为`null`。If this represents a return value (that is, if it was obtained by using the property), this property will be `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取对象的参数的方法，，然后使用属性获取的参数名称。The following example shows how to get objects for the parameters of a method, and then use the property to obtain the parameter names. [!code-cpp[Classic ParameterInfo.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ParameterInfo.Name Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ParameterInfo.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ParameterInfo.Name Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ParameterInfo.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ParameterInfo.Name Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法依赖于可选元数据，并可能在所有的编译器中可用。This method depends on an optional metadata and might not be available in all compilers. 若要获取数组，请先获取该方法或构造函数，然后调用。To get the array, first get the method or the constructor and then call . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取对象的参数的方法，，然后使用属性来显示每个参数的类型。The following example shows how to get objects for the parameters of a method, and then use the property to display the type of each parameter. summary.span: 获取参数在形参表中的位置（从零开始）。

span.span: Gets the zero-based position of the parameter in the formal parameter list.

value.span: 表示该参数在参数列表中所占位置的整数。

span.span: An integer representing the position this parameter occupies in the parameter list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有在方法签名中的参数 (即，形参列表中) 计算位置时需要考虑。Only parameters in the method signature (that is, in the formal parameter list) are considered when calculating the position. 例如，方法、 表示的隐藏的参数`this`(`Me`在 Visual Basic 中) 不计。For instance methods, the hidden parameter that represents `this` (`Me` in Visual Basic) is not counted. 此方法利用方法。This method utilizes the method. 若要获取数组，请先获取该方法或构造函数，然后调用。To get the array, first get the method or the constructor and then call .

summary.span: 参数列表中参数从零开始的位置。

span.span: The zero-based position of the parameter in the parameter list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段仅用于派生类中的用户`ParameterInfo`。This field is intended only for users who are deriving classes from `ParameterInfo`. 典型的参数名称访问是通过。Typical access to the name of the parameter is through .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property RawDefaultValue As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ RawDefaultValue { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个指示默认值的值（如果参数具有默认值）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the default value if the parameter has a default value.

value.span: 参数的默认值，或 （如果参数没有默认值）。

span.span: The default value of the parameter, or if the parameter has no default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在执行上下文和仅反射上下文中使用此属性。This property can be used in both the execution context and the reflection-only context. 在方法调用中未指定实际值时，使用默认值。The default value is used when an actual value is not specified in the method call. 参数可以具有默认值是`null`。A parameter can have a default value that is `null`. 这是不同于其中未定义默认值的情况。This is distinct from the case where a default value is not defined. 若要获取数组，请先获取该方法或构造函数，然后调用方法。To get the array, first get the method or the constructor and then call the method.
